properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Chesapeake Bay north of Pooles Island MD; Chester River to Queenstown MD; Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from North Beach to Drum Point MD; Eastern Bay; Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island; Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 6:38PM EST until January 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts
up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay main channel north of Smith Point VA,
Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA, Chester
River to Queenstown MD, Eastern Bay, Choptank River to
Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River, and Tangier Sound
and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 PM Thursday to 6 AM EST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 AM to 4 PM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY
